response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and potential impact, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects the high quality and unique features of the product, which I am confident will provide significant returns on investment for you. Should you choose to accept this offer, we can arrange for immediate delivery and ensure a smooth transition. If you have any questions or need more information, please don't hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 9500}
